snippet.title: ZOMB - PlayStation 4 Gameplay
snippet.description:
One of many shovelware games from Sabec Limited, the same company who made the terrible 3D remake of the Popeye arcade game.

All you do in ZOMB is shooting zombies and survive as many days as you can, while collecting ammo and health. The models are clearly taken from the Unity Asset Store (which is not a huge surprise, as it does run on Unity) and the zombies' death sound is laughable. It is quite a shocker that this was given a go-ahead to be sold for actual money on the PlayStation Store, while there are far, FAR better zombie-themed games to play on the PS4. And not even worth it for the trophies.

Even zombies are smart enough to tell that this is shovelware fodder, and they don't even HAVE brains to begin with!

ZOMB (C) Sabed Limited
Also available on Nintendo Switch.
